page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: There are 9 farms, 5 of which are: Florida (141 acres, mainly arable), Hollin Hey House(134 acres, mainly grazing), Garswood Gate (114 acres, mainly arable), Stanley Bank (86 acres, mainly arable) and Stanley House (9 acres, market vegetables). Of this total of 484 acres, 182.5 acres (38%) is{grazing}or{grass}for hay, 170 acres (35%) is{winter barley,}53 acres (11%) is{spring barley,}21 acres (4%) is{turnips,}18.5 acres (4%) is {potatoes,}17 acres (4%) is{oil seed} {rape}and 8 acres (1%) is market vegetables like{cabbage, cucumber,} {peppers}and{tomatoes.}Florida and Garswood Gate have beef cattle in sheds in winter, and Hollin Hey House grazes cattle and sheep. Florida has two horses, and Stanley Bank some poultry.
